text: Here , ' x ' and ' y ' are 2 strings and d ( x , y ) is the distance between ' x ' and ' y ' put as minimal cost of operations to transform ' x ' to ' y ' . The complexity of the algorithm is O ( m [UNK] n ) , where n and m are the lengths of 2 strings . 83 We used Perl extension for approximate matching ( Search . cpan . org , ( 2016 ) .
